text: William Randolph (1650-1711) was an early colonist, landowner, planter, merchant, and politician in Virginia. William Randolph may also refer to: *William Randolph II (1681–1741), American planter and politician, son of William Randolph *William Randolph III (son of William) (born c. 1710), owner of Wilton plantation house *William Randolph III (son of Thomas) (born 1712), owner of Tuckahoe plantation *William Millican Randolph (1893–1928), U.S. Army aviator ==See also== * William Randolph Hearst (disambiguation) *Randolph family of Virginia
title: William Randolph (disambiguation)
